General.Name: Dalian Thermal Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Dalian Thermal Power Co.,Ltd. engages in the generation of thermal power and heat in China. The company offers hot water for external heating by burning coal raw materials in coal-fired boilers. It also produces electricity, steam, and high-temperature water through power plants and heat source equipment. Dalian Thermal Power Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Dalian, China.
